TextBlock.Text: DAZ: Welcome to the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop,</color> friends! Here is where we craft scrolls and projection stones to transcribe and transport information in compact forms.
DAZ: If you are here to inquire about the memory statues, kindly seek Phlox in the <color=orange>Statue Workshop</color> within the island in my absence!
DAZ: However, if you seek my expertise in crafting projection stones (or wish to test out my newest invention), please seek me in my <color=orange>Workshop Loft</color> upstairs!
PHLOX: It was you who designed the memory statues' memory storage systems.. How terrible of you to direct such intricate queries to me!
PHLOX: Daz, I was only responsible for sculpting the memory statues' exteriors!
